isiXhosa: Kudala,  kwakukho indoda egama linguGoso. Wayefundisa abantwana ukufunda. Wayengabafundiseli kwindlu yesikolo,  kodwa phantsi komthi weselwa. Ngokunye ukuhlwa,  xa uGoso wayesahleli phantsi komthi,  efunda nzulu ngezifundo zosuku olulandelayo,  uPaa,  ibhadi,  wakhwela phezulu emthini ngokuthe cwaka ukuya kuba iziqhamo. Ngokwenza loo nto,  washukumisa,  wawisa iselwa elithe ngokuwa labetha utitshala entloko lambulala.
Xa befika abantwana kusasa,  bafumana utitshala wabo elele efile. Bazaliswa yintlungu. Ngoko ke,  emva kokumnika umngcwabo ohloniphekileyo,  bavumelana ukuba bafumane lo ubulele uGoso.

Emva kokuba bethethile ngalo mbandela,  bafika kwisiqgibo sokuba umoya wasezantsi ngumoni. Ngoko ke,  bawubamba umoya wasezantsi bawubetha. Umoya wasezantsi wakhala,  "Kutheni nindibetha nje? Ndenze ntoni?" Baza bathi,  "Ibinguwe ogibisele iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto. "Umoya wasezantsi wathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  ngendinganqandwa ludonga lodaka?"

Ngoko ke,  baya kudonga lodaka balubetha. Udonga lodaka lwalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha? Ndenze ntoni?" Baza bathi,  "Ibinguwe onqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Udonga lodaka lwathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla ngendigqojozwe yimpuku?"

Ngoko ke,  bahamba baya kubamba impuku bayibetha. Kodwa impuku yalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha nje? Ndenze ntoni?" Baza bathi,  "Ibinguwe ogqobhoze udonga lodaka,  udonga olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Impuku yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  ngendityiwe yikati?"

Ngoko ke,  bazingela ikati,  bayibamba,  baza bayibetha. Ikati yalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha? Ndenze ntoni?" Baphendula bathi,  "Nguwe otye impuku,  egqobhoze udonga lodaka; udonga olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Ikati yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  bendinokubotshwa ngentambo?"

Bathatha intambo bayibetha. Intambo yalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha? Ndenze ntoni?" Baza bathi,  "Nguwe obophelele ikati,  etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka,  olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto."  Intambo yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  bendingasikwa ngemesi?"

Baza bathatha imesi bayibetha. Imesi yalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha? Ndenze ntoni?" Baphendula bathi,  "Usike intambo,  ebophe ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto."  Imesi yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  ngenditshiswe ngumlilo?"

Baza bakhangela umlilo. Bawufumana,  bawubetha. Umlilo walila,  "Kutheni nindibetha? Ndenze ntoni?" Bathi,  "Utshise imesi,  esike intambo; ebophelele ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Umlilo wathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  bendiza kucinywa ngamanzi?"

Baza baya emanzini bawabetha. Amanzi alila,  "Kutheni nindibetha nje? Ndenze ntoni?" Bathi,  "Ucime umlilo,  otshise imesi; esike intambo; ebophelele ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Amanzi athi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  bendizakutshoniswa yinkomo?"

Baza baya enkomeni bayibetha. Inkomo yakhala,  "Nindibethelani? Ndenze ntoni?" Baza bathi,  "Usela amanzi,  acime umlilo; otshise imesi; esike intambo; ebophelele ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Inkomo yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  ngendithuthunjiswa yimpukane?"

Baza babamba impukane bayibetha. Impukane yalila,  "Kutheni nindibetha nje? Ndenze ntoni?" Bathi,  "Utshutshisa inkomo,  esele amanzi; acime umlilo; otshise imesi; esike intambo; ebophelele ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto." Kodwa impukane yathi,  "Ukuba bendinamandla,  ngendityiwe libhadi?"

Baza bafuna uPaa,  ibhadi. Bakumfumana,  bambetha. Wakhala wathi,  "Nindibethela ntoni? Ndenze ntoni?" Bathi,  "Utye impukane,  etshutshise inkomo; esele amanzi; acime umlilo; otshise imesi; esike intambo,  ebophelele ikati; etye impuku; egqobhoze udonga lodaka; olunqande umoya wasezantsi,  lo owise iselwa elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Ngowungayenzanga loo nto."

UPaa,  ngokumangaliseka ekubeni efumanekile,  nangokoyika iziphumo zokubulala utitshala ngengozi,  wathi cwaka. Baza bathi abantwana,  "Yeha! Awu! Akanagama lokuzithethelela. Ngulo mfo ojule iselwa ezantsi elibethe utitshala wethu uGoso. Siza kumohlwaya!"
Luganda: Waaliwo omusajja eyayitibwanga Bbosa. Yasomesanga abaana okusoma naye nga tabasomeseza mu kibiina wabula wansi w'omuti gw'ebireku.

Akawungeezi akamu,  enjaza yalinnya ku muti ogwo,  okubba ebibala. Yanyeenya omuti ekireku nekivaako ne kikuba Bosa ku mutwe ne kimutta. Abaana bwe baasanga omusomesa waabwe nga yafudde era ng'agalamidde awo ku ttaka ne banakuwala nnyo. Baayagala bategeera eyasse Bbosa.

Baakwata empewo y'omu maserengeta ne bagibuuza; "Nti gwe wasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye empewo n'ebaddamu nti,  "Siinga nalina amaanyi nandiziyizibbwa ekisenge eky'ettaka?"

Bwe baawulira ebyo ne bagenda eri ekisenge ky'ettaka ne bakigamba nti,  "Gwe waziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula wansi ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye ekisenge ky'ettaka n'ekiddamu nti,  "Siinga nalina amaanyi emmese yandimbomoddemu etya ekituli?"

Awo ne banoonya emmese era ne bagizuula. Kye baava bagigamba nti,  "Gwe wawummula ekisenge ky'ettaka ekyalemesa empewo y'omu maserengeta,  eyasuula wansi ekireku ekakyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye Emmese neddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  kkapa yandindidde?"

Ate awo ne banoonya kkapa era ne bagigamba nti,  "Gwe olya emmesse ezibotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka,  ekiziyiza empewo y'omumaseregengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye kkapa n'eddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi naalibadde nsibibwa n'omuguwa?"

Kati ate ne bagendda ku muguwa. Ne bagugamba nti,  Ggwe osiba kkapa erya emmese,  ezibotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye omuguwa ne gugamba nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi akambe kaandinsaze?

Olwo nno ate ne badda ku kambe. Kye baava bakamba nti,  "Nti ggwe osala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese,  ebotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye akambe ne kaddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  nandyokeddwa omuliro?"

Tebaalwa ne banoonya omuliro. Ne bagugama nti,  "Gwe oyokya akambe,  akasala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese ebotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bosa? Mazima tewaandikikoze." Naye omuliro ne guddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  amazzi gandinzikizizza?"

Ne bagenda ku mazzi. Kye baava bagagamba nti,  "Ggwe ozikiza omuliro ogwokya akambe,  akasala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese ezibotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka eziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze. Naye amazzi ne gabagamba nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  Ekibe kyandinywedde?

Ate awo ne balaba ekibe era ne bakibuuza nti,  "Ggwe onywa amazzi agazikiza omuliro ogwokya akambe akasala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese ezbotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa?" Mazima tewandikikoze." Naye Ekibe ne kibaddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  nandirumiddwa enswera?

Tebaalwa ne badda ku nswera. Ne bagibuuza nti,  "Ggwe oluma ekibe ekinywa amazzi agazikiza omuliro ogwokya akambe akasala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese ezibotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa?" Mazima tewandikikoze. Naye enswera n'eddamu nti,  "Singa nalina amaanyi,  enjaza yandindidde?"

Abaana ne banoonya enjaza era ne bagibuuza nti,  "Ggwe olya enswera eziruma ekibe ekinywa amazzi agazikiza omuliro ogwokya akambe akasala omuguwa ogusiba kkapa erya emmese ezibotola mu kisenge ky'ettaka ekiziyiza empewo y'omu maserengeta eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa? Mazima tewandikikoze."
Enjaza yeewuunya nnyo okulaba nga bagizudde era teyalina kya kwogera. Kati abaana ne bagamba nti,  "Ddala ye ggwe eyasuula ekireku ekyakuba omusomesa waffe Bbosa. Ggwe osaana okubonerezebwa."

isiXhosa:
Kudala-dala, kwakukho indoda eyayinezinto ezininzi. Yayine fama enkulu etyebileyo, ineenkomo, iigusha neebhokhwe. 

Kodwa, njengoko yayikhula isiba ndala, yakhulelwa kukungonwabi, kuba yayinye into eyayingekho. Yaye ingenankosikazi.

Ime phantsi komthi ngenye imini, yaba nengcinga elungileyo. 

Ukuba ayide iyifumane inkosikazi, mhlawumbi ingazenzela.

Ngoko ke, yathathisa ukusebenza ibumba umfazi omhle esebeni elomeleleyo lomthi. 

Yakugqiba ukuwenza umfanekiso oqingqiweyo,  yambamba amehlo aze avuleka. Yavuthela kancinane kuye, waphila.

Ngenene wayengoyena mfazi mhle eyakhe yambona. 

Yaguqa phambi kwakhe, yamcela ukuba abe yinkosikazi yakhe.

Yampha ifasikoti enemibala emininzi, iintsimbi neringi yentloko, uphawu lomfazi otshatileyo. Kwaye yamakhela indlu yodaka nengca eyayidla ngokulala emazantsi esiqu somthi ayeqingqwe ngaso. 

"Inye kuphela into endiyicela kuwe," yatsho kunkosikazi yayo. "Ungaze uxelele nabani na apho uvela khona."

Kodwa, kungekudala, amadoda amancinane asuka kwilali ekufutshane aqala athethana phakathi kwawo. 

"Kwenzeka njani na ukuba indoda endala ngolu hlobo ibe neyona nkosikazi intle?" Ngoko ke bagqiba kwelokuba bayibe ukuze bayithathe bayise kubuhlanti babo.

Indoda endala yayinentliziyo ekhathazekileyo. Yaziva ingenakho ukuphila ngaphandle kwenkosikazi yayo. 

Kodwa ke yacinga, "Mhlawumbi ukuba ndinento yakhe, andinakuziva ndilusizi?" Ngoko ke yathumela amahobe ayo ukuba amfumane, amculele azise into yakhe kuye.

Akumfumana amahobe, amculele ngolwimi lweentaka: 

Nkosikazi yomthi, nkosikazi yomthi, umhle ngaphezu kwakhe nabani na. Umyeni wakho usithumile ukuba size nefasikoti yakho!

Wawanika ifaskoti yakhe, aze abhabha phezu kwentaba, phezu komlambo, ephindela emva kumyeni wakhe. 

Umyeni wakhe wayibamba ifasikoti ebusweni bakhe, wakhe wathuthuzeleka okwethutyana.

Kodwa ukumkhumbula zange kuphele. Waza kwakhona wathumela amahobe akhe ukuba amculele: 

Nkosikazi yomthi, nkosikazi yomthi, umhle ngaphezu kwakhe nabani na. Umyeni wakho usithumile ukuba sizise iringi yakho yentloko! 

Aza aphinda abhabha neringi yentloko, uphawu lomfazi otshatileyo.

Indoda yayibamba iringi yentloko, yaphefumlela inkosikazi yayo kakhulu, ekude ebuhlanti babanye abantu. 

Emva kwethutyana, yabiza amahobe akhe kwakhona ukuba aye kuye acule athi: 

Nkosikazi yomthi, nkosikazi yomthi, umhle ngaphezu kwakhe nabani na. Umyeni wakho usithumile ukuba sibuyise ubomi bakho kwakhona!

Ngoko ke, ahamba ithuba lesithathu. Athi ngcu emagxeni akhe, njengoko ecula, intaka nganye yanqola iliso. 

Ngokukhawuleza, inkosikazi yajika kwakhona yaba ngumfanekiso oqingqiweyo. Iinyawo zakhe neengalo zawa phaya. Kwalandela intloko yakhe. Yaza yawa emhlabeni.

Umyeni wakhe wasiqengqa ngokucotha isiqu sakhe seplanga ukuya emlanjeni. 

Wammisa nengcambu zakhe emanzini. Uthe wakondliwa lilanga nomhlaba, wamila amagqabi kwakhona.
Xa umoya uvuthuza, amagqabi aphefumlela phezulu, njengokuba umfazi esenza xa ekhumbula umyeni wakhe.
Luganda: Awo olwatuuka,  ne wabaawo omusajja eyali omugagga ennyo. Yalina ennimiro engimu n'eddundiro eddene okuli ente,  endiga n'embuzi. Bwe yagenda akaddiwa; nanakuwala nnyo kubanga teyalina mukazi.
Lumu,  aba ayimiridde wansi w'omuti n'afuna ekirowoozo. Nti oba nga yali tasobola kufuna omukyala,  waakiri asobola okwekolerayo omu?
Awo bwe yalaba ettabi eddungi; n'atandika okubajjamu omukyala omulungi. Ng'amazze okubajja; n'akwatta ku maaso g'ekibajje ne gafuuka amaaso ddala. Ekibajje n'akifuuwamu omukka ne kifuna obulamu.
Oyo ye mukyala omulungi ennyo gwe yali talababangako. Yafukamira mu maaso ge n'amusaba abeere mu kaziwe.

Yamwambaza ekyambalo ky'obugole,  embira,  n'omuge n'alabikira ddala ng'omugole bw'abera. N'amuzimbira ennyumba ey'obudongo n'essubi mweyawummuliranga. "Ekintu kimu kye nkusaba,  "Tobuulirangako omuntu yenna gye wava.

Naye nga tewannayita kiseera kinene,  abavubuka ku kyalo eky'okumulirano baatandika okwogera bokka na bokka nti,  "Kijja kitya omusajja omukadde bw'atyo okubeera n'omukyala omuto ate nga mulungi nyo bw'atyo?" Kye baava basalawo bamubbe bamutwale mu kiraalo kyabwe.

Omusajja omukadde okumubbako omukyala ky'amukutula omutima era n'alowooza nti tasobola kubeerawo nga talina mukyala. Kye yava alowooza nti,  "Singa mbadde nnina ekintu kye kyonna oba sandinakuwadde nnyo?" Bw'atyo n'asindika amayuba ge okumunoonya,  gamuyimbire n'okumuleetera ekintu kyonna eky'omukyala.
Amayuba bwe gaamusanga ne gamuyimbira mu lulimi lw'ebinyonyi: "Omukazi omubajje,  omukazi omubajje Oli mulungi okukira abakazi abalala Balo atutumye okuzzaayo ekyambalo kyo!"
Omukazi n'awa amayuba ekyambalo ne gabuuka ne gakitwalira bba. Bwe yakyebika mumaaso,  n'awulira bulungi okumala akaseera.

Naye ebirowoozo bye tebyatereera. Era n'addamu n'atuma amayuba ge okumuyimbira: "Omukazi omubajje,  omukazi omubajje Olimulungi okukira abakazi abalala Balo atutumye okuzzayo engule yo." Ne biddayo n'engule ng'akabonero k'omukazi omufumbo.

Yakwata engule n'agissa ku nnyindo nga bw'asika omukka ng'ali eyo mu biraalo by'abantu abalala. Nga wayise akaseera,  yaddamu nate okuyita amayuba ge era n'agatuma gaddeyo gamuyimbire: "Omukazi omubajje,  omukazi omubajje Olimulungi okukira abakazi abalala Balo atutumye okuzzaayo obulamu bwo."

Era amayuba ne gaddayo ogwokusatu. Ne gagwa ku bibegabega bye,  ne bimubojja amaaso ge gombi nga bwe biyimba. Amangu ago; n'afuuka ekibajje. Ebigere bye n'emikono gye ne bikutukako n'omutwe gwe era bw'atyo yenna n'agwa wansi.
Omwami we n'asindika mpola mpola ekibajje okutuuka ku mugga. N'amuyimiriza mu mazzi n'ekikolo kye kiri mu ttaka. Era bwe yafuna amazzi n'ettaka lye yamusimbamu,  yaddamu n'amera ebikoola.
Era embuyaga bw'ekuunta ebikoola nga byenyeenya nga bwe bivaamu eddoboozi. Nga bikolera ddala ng'omukazi bw'akola ng'ayagala bba.

isiXhosa: Kudala-dala,  icilikishe nesele babe ngabahlobo.
Isele lalinomona bubuhle nenkazimlo yecilikishe.
"Wenze njani ukuze ubemhle? Jonga mna,  ndimbi. Ndenze njani ngolwam ulusu?" latsho isele.
Lathi icilikishe,  "Mamela,  galela amanzi embizeni uyibeke emlilweni. Ecaleni kwakho."
Kodwa isele lathi,  "Sendiyazi,  ndiyayazi. Thula,  mhlobo wam." Lahamba.
Lafika ekhaya lagalela amanzi embizeni.
Athe xa amanzi eqala ukubila,  lazijula kuwo.
Ze latsha ulusu lakhe,  laqhawukelwa nangumsila.
Endaweni yokuba liqhakazele libelihle nje ngecilikishe,  laba libi nangakumbi!
Luganda: Emyaka mingi emabega,  Wamunya ne Wakikere bali bamukwano. Olunaku lumu baabayita ku kabaga.
Wakikere yatunurira Wamunya nawulira obujja anti Wamunya yali mulungi nnyo.
Wakikere yabuuza Wamunya nti ''Wakolaki okunyirira bwotyo? Ntunulira,  nze ndi mubi nnyo nkolentya olususu lwange?
Wamunya namugamba nti "Wuliriza,  bwetuddayo eka,  sena amazzi ogateeke munsuwa ogateke kumuliro." Ekidako.
Wakikere teyalinda kumumalirayo teyagenda na kukabaga yadduka buddusi natuuka eka.
Yasooka kusirikirira nalowooza naye nga obujja bumulumira mukwano gwe Wamunya olw'obulungi bwe.
Yasalawo nateeka amazzi munsuwa nassa ku muliro.
Amazzi bwegatandika okwesera,  neyebikamu.
Ha! Ekyatuuka ku Wakikere,  olususu lwe lwona lwajja nomukira negukutukako.
Mukifo kyokubeera omujagujagu era omubalagavu nga Wamunya yafuuka kkanga baana Kitalo!

isiXhosa: Ngenye imini,  izilwanyana zathatha isigqibo sokwenza itheko. Kodwa kwakungangeni zonke izilwanyana. Yayilitheko lezilwanyana ezineempondo zodwa.
Umvundla waye wazilungiselela ukuya ethekweni. Kodwa wafumanisa ukuba asilolika wonke-wonke. Yayilele zilwanyana ezineempondo zodwa.
Umvundla waya ndaweni ithile wafumana mpondo zithile. Waye wazibeka kuye entloko waze waya ethekweni.
Ngexesha esethekweni umvundla waye watya,  wasela,  wade waxhentsa.
Lento yamenza wadinwa waze walala elangeni. Kodwa ngelixesha aleleyo,  iimpondo zaye zawa!
Ke ngoko,  zonke izilwanyana zaye zafumanisa ukuba umvundla lo akasiso esi silwanyana bebecinga ukuba siso. Ke ngoku,  zaye zamtsala ngeendlebe zade zanwebeka kakhulu.
Waze wabaleka. Yiyo lento imivundla ineendlebe ezinkulu!
Luganda:
Olwatuuka, Ensolo nezissalawo okola akabaga.
Naye tekaali ka zzoonna.Kaali ka nsolo ezzirina amayembe zzoka.
Akamyu kaali ketegekera akabaga. Naye kaakizuula nti akabaga tekaali kabulyomu. kaali kabiisolo ebilina amayembe.
Akamyu kagenda ewantu nekafuna yo amayembe.Ne kagateeka kumutwe gwaako nekagenda kukabaga.
Kukabaga akamyu kaalya ne kaanywa ne kabiibya.
Kino kyakaletera okukoowa ne kaggwa wansi mumusana.Naye bwekaali nga kakyebasse,amayembe gaagwa!
Awo nebisolo byonna  byakizuula nti akamyu tekali kika kyensolo kye bayagala. Nolwekyo zasiika amatu paka lwe ggagejja ne gagejja.
Awo nezzidukawo. Eyo yensoonga lwaaki Akamyu kalina Amatu amannene.

isiXhosa: Le yinkomo.   Inkomo intle!
Emini yinkomo eqhelekileyo.
Ibhabhisa iKhayithi.
Okanye ikhaba ibhola.
Ebusuku inkomo ebalaseleyo!
Isindisa imiphefumlo.
Kwaye ilwa ulwaphulo-mthetho.
Kodwa,  ukuba uvala amehlo akho ngokuqinileyo ngenene,  kwaye wenze Umnqwno -.
Inkomo ingeza Kukubona nawe ngokunjala!
Isiphetho.
Luganda: Ono Wante.   Wante omulungi era omuteefu!
Emisana,  abeera ng'ente eya bulijjo.
Abuusa kayiti.
Asamba omupiira.
Ekiro afuuka ente ey'ebyewuunyo!
Eyamba abali mu buzibu.
n'okulwanyisa obumenyi bw'amateeka.
Naye singa ozibiriza n'osaba.
Wante naawe ayinza okujja n'akukyalira!
Nange awo we nnalabira!

isiXhosa:
Kwilali ekwithambeka leMount Kenya eMpuma Afrika, intombazanana encinane yayisebenza emasimini kunye nomama wayo.

Igama lale ntombazanana yayinguWangari.
UWangari wayekuthanda kakhulu ukuba phandle. Esitiyeni sakowabo semifuno wayeqhokra amagada ngephanga yakhe eyimatshete. Wayeqhusheka iinkozo zembewu ezincinane kuloo mhlaba ufudumeleyo.

Elona xesha lemini awayelithanda kakhulu kwakusemva nje kokutshona kwelanga. Xa sele kumnyama kakhulu ukuba zibonakale izityalo, uWangari wayesazi ukuba elo lixesha lokuba agoduke.

Wayelandela loo ndledlana inqumla emasimini, awele nemilambo xa egoduka.

UWangari wayengumntwana okrelekrele kwaye wayesele etshiseka, efuna ukuqalisa esikolweni. Kodwa umama notata wakhe babefuna ukuba ahlale ekhaya abancedise.

Xa wayeneminyaka esixhenxe ubudala, umntakwabo omdala wacenga abazali bakhe ukuba bamvumele aye esikolweni.

UWangari wayekuthanda kakhulu ukufunda!

UWangari wafunda ngakumbi kwincwadi nganye athe wayifunda. Waqhuba kakuhle kakhulu esikolweni kangangokuba wamenywa ukuba aye kufunda eMerika.

UWangari wayechulumance kakhulu! Wayefuna ukwazi nokufunda ngakumbi ngehlabathi.

Kwidyunivesithi yaseMerika uWangari wafunda izinto ezininzi ezintsha. Wafunda ngezityalo nendlela ezityalwa ngayo ukuze zikhule. Kananjalo wayikhumbula indlela awakhula ngayo: edlala imidlalo kunye nabantakwabo phantsi kwemithi yamahlathi amahle aseKenya.

Okukhona efunda kwaba kokukhona aqondayo ukuba ubathanda ngenene abantu baseKenya. Wayefuna ukuba bonwabe kwaye bakhululeke.

Okukhona efunda, kwaba kokukhona ekhumbula ikhaya lakhe lase-Afrika.

Wathi akuzigqiba izifundo zakhe uWangari, wabuyela eKenya. Kodwa ufike ilizwe lakhe litshintshile. Kwakukho iifama ezinkulu ezazinabele kulo lonke ilizwe lakowabo.

Abasetyhini babengenazo iinkuni zokubasa imililo ukuze bapheke. Abantu babehlupheka kwaye abantwana babelambile.

UWangari wayesazi ngqo ukuba makenze ntoni na. Wafundisa abasetyhini indlela yokulima imithi besebenzisa imbewu.

Aba basetyhini bayithengisa le mithi baze bayisebenzisa loo mali ukondla iintsapho zabo. 

Abasetyhini ngoku nabo bonwaba kakhulu. UWangari wayebancedile ngokubaxhobisa ukuze bazive bomelele.

Kuthe ngokuhamba kwexesha, le mithi mitsha yakhula yangamahlathi, yaze nemilambo yaphinda yaqukuqela. Umyalezo kaWangari wasasazeka kulo lonke elase-Afrika.

Kunamhlanje nje, zizigidi ngezigidi zemithi ezikhule zisuka kwimbewu kaWangari.

UWangari wasebenza nzima kakhulu.

Abantu kwihlabathi liphela bakuqaphela oko, baze bamwonga ngembasa eyaziwayo. Le mbasa ibizwa ngokuthi yiMbasa yoXolo kaNobel, kwaye ube ngowasetyhini wokuqala wase-Afrika ukufumana le mbasa.
UWangari ubhubhe ngowama-2011, kodwa sicinga ngaye ngalo lonke ixesha sibona imithi emihle.
Luganda: Kukyalo ku kaselegeto ko olusozi lwe kenya mu yist afrilica,akawala akatono kakola nga mu kisawe ne mama waako.Amanya gaako gaali Wangari.
Wangari yayagala nyo okubela wabweru.Munimiro yemele yaboluganda namenya etaka ne jambiya.Ya nyigira obusigo obu tini mu nsi ebuguma.
Olunaku lwe olusinga lwali kawugenzi.Bwebwaziba nga okulaba ebimera,Wangari yamanya kali kasera ka kugenda waka.Yali agobelera akakubo a katono akayita mubisawe,okusala enyanya nga bwa genda.

Wangari yali mwana mugezi nga ntayinza kulinda ku ngenda kusomelo.Naye mama we ne tata bali bagala a sigale.abayambe koawaka.Bweyali emyaka musanvu,muganda we omulenzi omukulu ya sikiliza basade be okumuleka agende kusomelo.

Ya yagala okuyiga! Wangari yayiga binji mu bitabo byeyasoma. Ya kola bulungi nyo kusomero ne bamwaniliza okusomela mu United States ya Amerika. Wangari yali musanyufu! Abade ayagala okumanya ebintu binji ku nsi.

Ku universite ya Amelica Wangari gyeyayigila ebintu ebipya bingi.Yasoma ebimela ne jebikula mu.Na jukiila bweyakulamu:nga azanya emizanyo ne baganda be abalenzi mu bisikilize bye miti mu biibila ebilungi ebya banakenya.
Bweyeyongera okuyiga,jeyeyongera okumanya nti yali ayagala abantu ba kenya.Ya yagala babele basanyufu.Gyeyeyongera okuyiga,jeyeyogera okujukila amakage mu aflica.

Bweyali ya kamaliliza emisomo je,ya komawo e kenya.Naye ensi ye yali ekyuse.Enimiro enene zali zi geze  okusala mu bibanja.Abachala tebayina nku ezo kukuma omulilo gwo ku bumba.Abantu bali bavu  na baana bali bayala.

Wangari yamanya ekyokukola.Ya somesa abachala okusimba emiti okuva mu singo.Abachala batunda emiti ne bakozesa sente okulabilila abengada zabwe.Ela basanyuka nyo.Wangari yali yabayamba okuwulila amanyi.
Ekisela bwe kyayitawo,emiti emipya negikula mu bibila,ne nyanja ne zitandika okukulukuta nate. Awo obubaka bwa Wangari nebusasana okwetolola Afilica.Leero,obukade bwe miti bukuze mu singo za Wangari.
Wangari yali yakola nyo.Abantu mu nsi yona balaba,neba muwa ekilabo ekyo kumanyika.bakiyita ekilabo kye emilembe  gyo bwesigwa,ate  omuchala eyali asoka mu Aflica okuchifuna.
Wangari yafa mu 2011,naye tumulowoza ko buli kisera lwe tulaba omuti omulungi.

isiXhosa: UTom uphethe ingobozi yeebhanana ezivuthiweyo.
UTom uya emarikeni uyothengisa iibhanana.
Abantu abasemarikeni bathenga iziqhamo.
Kodwa akukho mntu ozithengayo iibhanana zikaTom. Bakhetha ukuthenga iziqhamo ebafazini.
"Ekuhlaleni,  ngabafazi bodwa abathengisa iziqhamo," batsho abantu. "Yindoda enjani na le?" bayabuza abantu.
Kodwa uTom akancami. Uyakhwaza,  "Thengani iibhanana zam! Thengani iibhanana zam ezinencasa ezivuthiweyo!"
Omnye umfazi uthatha ipakethi yeebhanana engobozini. Ujonga iibhanana ngononophelo.
Lo mfazi uthenga iibhanana.
Abantu abaninzi beza esitendini. Bathenga iibhanana zikaTom bazitye.
Msinyane,   ingobozi ayinanto. UTom ubala imali ayenzileyo.
Aze uTom athenge isepha,  iswekile,  nesonka. Ufaka izinto engobozini yakhe.
UTom ungcekelela ingobozi entlokweni yakhe agoduke.
Luganda: Tomu yetika olusaniya lw'amenvu.
Tomu agenda mu katale natunda amenvu.
Abantu mu katale bali mukugula bibala.
Naye tewali muntu nomu agula menvu ga Tomu. Abantu basinga kwagala kugula bibala kuva ku bakazi.
"Mukitundu kyaffe, abakazi bebatunda ebibala boka," abantu bwe'bagamba. "Ono omusajja wakika ki?"
Naye Tomu teyagwaamu maanyi. Yayitanga bantu, "Mugule amenvu! Mugule amenvu gange agawooma ate agengedde."
Omukazi omu kyeyava atoola ekiwagu kya'menvu okuva ku lusaniya. Neyekebejja amenvu gano nobwegendereza.
Omukazi awo nasalawo okugula amenvu.
Abantu nebeyongera okugenda kumudaala. Nebatandika okugula amenvu ga Tomu nebalya.
Amangu olusaniya nelukalira. Awo Tomu yatandika okubala sente zeyali afunye.
Era Tomu yagulamu Sabuuni, Sukaali n'omugaati. Nateeka ebintu bye ku lusaniya.
Awo Tomu neyetika olusaniya lwe kumutwe nadayo ewaka.

isiXhosa: Ifikile imini ekade ixelwa. Kuza kudlalwa! I-Chiefs ne-Aces ebaleni! Yiza kubukela! Yiza nevuvuzela yakho!
Makhosi amahle,  indebe mayilale ekhaya! Ndifuna sisebenzisane,  ukuze siyohlule i-Aces. Kufuneka sihlasele ngobuchule,  siqaphele sabelane ngebhola.
Gqithisa,  gqithisa Portia,  Modise! Nqanda,  nqanda Jomo! Nantso ke,  nantso ke,  mayiye ezipalini! Po-o-o-o! Po-o-o-o! Po-o-o-o! Yavakala ivuvuzela!
Nidlale kakuhle Makhosi amahle. Nihlasele ngobuchule. Niqaphele,  kwaye nabelene ngebhola. Nisebenzisene.
Ezandleni! 'Ezandleni Makhosi,  ezandleni!' watsho encoma umqeqeshi u-Coach.
Owu! Sidiniwe. Kodwa,  bekumnandi ukuziqhelisa. Siza kudlala nini kanene Coach?
Ifikile imini ebikad'ixelwa! U-Coach usiphathele isinxibo. Halala Makhosi,  halala! Kuza kudlalwa! Ngeyethu indebe,  ngeyethu! Po-o-o-o-o! Po-o-o-o! Po-o-o-o-o! Yavakala ivuvuzela.
Asisesihle isinxibo sethu! Siyabulela Coach. Ungumqeqeshi wokwenyani!
Luganda: Kato alina akapiira. Nalule alina akapiira.
Abaana bali mu kisaawe. Abaan balina omutendesi.
Omutendesi abatendeka okuzannya akapiira.
Omutendesi abwaebiragiro.
Kato asiibula omutendesi. Nalule asiibula omutendesi.
Bonna badda eka.
Omukulu w'essomero abaleetera ebyambalo.
Omutendesi abgabira ebyambalo. Abaana bonna basanyuka.

isiXhosa: "Andikwazi ukukuphakamisa Shanu!"utsho uAmmi"Umkhulu kakhulu!"
"Awunakuya wedwa  esikolweni, Shanu!"utsho uAbbu.'Umncinci  kakhulu!"
"Awunakulala ebhedini yosana, Shanu!" utsho uDadu."Umkhulu kakhulu!"
﻿"Awunakufunqula usana uluse epakini, Shanu!" utsho uDadi."Umncinci  kakhulu!"
UShanu umangalisekile.Ndimkhulu kakhulu!Ndimncinci kakhulu!Angamkhulu kakhulu njani aphinde abemncinci kakhulu ngaxeshanye?
Umkhulu kakhulu ukunxiba ilokhwe yakhe endala epinki.Umncinci ﻿kakhulu ukwenza idosasi estovini..
Mkhulu kakhulu ukuba abelekwe nguDadu?Mncinci kakhulu ukuba abeleke usana?
"Ndilingenwe kukwenza ntoni ke?UShanu uyazicingela.
UAmmi uyamncumela athi, "Kuba, umkhulu ngokwanele ukuba uye kwisikolo esikhulu."
'Kwaye  umncinci ngokwanele ukuba ndikuthwale emagxeni am," utsho uAbbu.
"Kwaye umkhulu ngokwanele ukuba sihambe kusasa sobabini,"utsho uDadu
"Kwaye umncinci ngokwanele mna ukuze ndikubalisele amabali." utsho uDadi
"Kwaye uyakuhlala, uhlale ulingene kanye... ukuba senjenje!" bonke batsho, baze bamanga ngobuhle nangobuushusu
Luganda: Sisobola kusitula wagulu Shanu! Ammi yagamba.
"Tosobola kutambula kusomelo weka," Abudu yagamba.
"Tosobola kwebaka mukatenda ka mwena Shanu, " Dudu yagamba.
"Tosobola kusitula mwana kumutwala wakuzanyila Shanu." Dadi yagamba.
Shanu awunzi. Kinenenyo !! Kitonyo !!
Katononyo okukola kabalagala ku stovu
Katononyo okusitula omwana.
ki kindi!! nekanaki?
"Olimunene ekimala okuntambu zamu kumakya."Dadu nagamba
Ate olimutononyo nze okubulila engero. Dadi nagamba..
Ela ojakubera nga nekipimo ekilungi.

isiXhosa:
Kwakuyiholide ka-Amma. Wayefunda incwadi. UAnil naye wayeneholide. Wayefuna ukwenza .... INTO!
“Amma, ndifuna ukubona ukuba yintoni le ikule bhokisi iluhlaza!” watsho uAnil.
“Kamva, Anil,” wathi u-Amma.

Kwakuyiholide ka-Amma. Wayefunda incwadi. UAnil naye wayeneholide. Wayefuna ukwenza .... INTO!
“Amma, ndifuna ukubona ukuba yintoni le ikule bhokisi iluhlaza!” watsho uAnil.
“Kamva, Anil,” wathi u-Amma.

Kwakuyiholide ka-Amma. Wayefunda incwadi. UAnil naye wayeneholide. Wayefuna ukwenza .... INTO!
“Amma, ndifuna ukubona ukuba yintoni le ikule bhokisi iluhlaza!” watsho uAnil.
“Kamva, Anil,” wathi u-Amma.

Kwakuyiholide ka-Amma. Wayefunda incwadi. UAnil naye wayeneholide. Wayefuna ukwenza .... INTO!
“Amma, ndifuna ukubona ukuba yintoni le ikule bhokisi iluhlaza!” watsho uAnil.
“Kamva, Anil,” wathi u-Amma.

UAnil wabeka isitulo ngaphezulu kwesitulo. Uye wakhwela ukuyokubeka ibhokisi phantsi.
"Hayi hayi! Akunjalo! Zonke iibhokisi ezingaphezulu koku ziya kuwela entlokweni yethu, Anil! ” Utshilo u-Amma.
UAnil wayenomsindo kakhulu. Wayenomsindo nomama wakhe.
"Yiza, makhe siye emarikeni siyokuthathela into," watsho u-Amma.

UAnil wayenomsindo kakhulu nasemva kokuba baye emarikeni.
Ndifuna leya! ” Utsho esolatha i-orenji.
Hayi, hayi, ayinguye lowo! Zonke iziqhamo ziya kuwa phantsi! ” watsho umnini venkile.

Ndifuna le ncwadi! ” watsho uAnil.
“Hayi, hayi, hayi.” utshilo unonovenkile. “Thatha le.”

Ndifuna leya! ” wakhwaza uAnil, ephantse wakhupha isamusa kwimfumba ephezulu ye samasosa.

“Hayi, hayi, hayi.” umlumkisile umnini-venkile.

“Zonke iisamo zam ziya kuwela phantsi!”

Ndiyayifuna! ” Watsho u-Anil ekhwaza. Ngoku wayekwimeko embi kakhulu.

“Hayi, hayi, hayi.” Watsho umthengisi weentyatyambo. “Musa ukubachukumisa! Baza kuthanda. ”
Ngelixesha, uAnil wayelila kakhulu. Wonke umntu wayejonge kuAnil.

“Ndiyayifuna leyo! Emnyama! ” Watsho u-Amma ekhwaza.
UAnil wayeka ukulila ngequbuliso.
“Amma, hayi, hayi! Asiyiyo leya! ” watsho uAnil.

"Masithathe le emdaka!" watsho uAnil. Emva koko uAnil wayiphakamisa ngenene injana emdaka phezu kwenqwaba yeenjana.
“Amma, ndinomsindo kakhulu ngawe! Zonke iinjana zaziya kuwa phantsi! ”
U-Amma wancuma. UAnil naye wayencumile. Ebengasenamsindo tu ngoku.
Luganda: lwaliluwumulalwa  Amma.Yali asoma akatabo.Anil nayeyalimuluwumula.Anil nayagala okubakokyakola!"Amma njagala kulabakiki ekiri mukibokisikyabululu" Anil nagamba."oluvanyuma, Amma nagamba.
Anil yateeka akasituulu wagulu wa katebe. Yalinnya wagulu okugyayo ekibokisi. Amma nagamba Anil "Nedda, nedda! sikyekyo! ebibokisibyonna ebiri wagulu bijja tugwira kumitwe.
Anil yalimunnyivu nnyo eri maama we.
"Amma nagamba Anil,Jangu tugende mu katale mbeko ne  kyenkufunirayo"
Anil yali akyali munyiivu  newebagendera mu katale."Njagala ekyo, nayogera nga bwasonga kumukyungwa owe dduuka  nagana, nedda nedda ebibala byonna bijja kuyika.
"Anil nagamba njagala kitabo.owedduka nagamba sikyekyo twala kino.
Anil nalekana nti, njagala ekyo kumpi kusikayo sumbusa..Owedduka nagamba,"Nedda, sumbusa zange zonna zijja kuyiika.
Anil naleekana nnyo nti njagala ekyo nga munyiivu nnyo. Atunda ebimuli nagaana ,tobikwatako bijja kukala.
Akaseera ako Anil yali akabira waggulu buli omu nga amutunulidde.
Amm nayogerela waggulu nti "njagala ekyo ekiddugavu".Anil nasirikirawo. Amma nagamba Anil ,"Nedda sikyekyo!"
Anil nagamba," tutwale kano akakitaka" oluvanyuma najjamu akabwa kakitaka.Amma ndimunyivu nnyo joli obubwa bwonna bwandiyise.Bonna nebassanyuka, Amma yali yakyaki munyiivu nakatono.

isiXhosa:
Kudala, kwakukho abafana ababini ababelahlekelwe ziinkomo. 

Bazikhangela iinkomo kwade kwarhatyela.

Kusarhatyele njalo, babona isibane komnye umzi. 

Bavumelana ngokuyocela indawo yokulala apho.

Baya kulo mzi bankqonkqoza. Lwavuleka ucango baze bangena. 

Abafana zange babone mntu. Kodwa beva ilizwi libabulisa.
Lathi ilizwi, "Ndiyintwala. Vulani imbiza nitye. Vulani la mbiza yomdongwe nisele amarhewu."
Yaze ke intwala yanxiba ulusu lwayo yaphuma.
Abafana batya, basela, baze babulela. Bemka kulo mzi.

Besahamba njalo, babanengcinga embi. Bathi,  "Hayi,  ayinokwenzeka into yokuba siphiwe ukutya yintwala." 

Ekugqibeleni bavumelana ukuba bajike bayotyumza le ntwala.

Babuyela kula mzi baze bayityumza intwala. 

Ngephanyazo intwala yanyamalala, yaze nendlu yanyamalala! 

Bazifumana bengaphandle ethafeni.
Luganda: Edda ennyo,  waaliwo abavubuka babiri abaabulwako ente zaabwe. Baanoonya ente,  obudde ne bubazibako.
Obudde nga buzibye,  baalengera ekitangaala mu nnyumba. Bakkiriziganya okugendayo basuzibwe.
Baakonkona ku nju, oluggi nelweggula,  ne bayingira. Abavubuka tebaasangamu muntu yenna,  wabula baawulira eddoboozi eribalamusa.
Eddoboozi lyagamba,  "Ndi nsekere. Musaanukule ensuwa muly'emmere. Musaanukule n'akasuumbi munywe omubisi."
Oluvannyuma ensekere n'eyambala eddiba lyayo,  n'efuluma.
Abavubuka baalya,  ne banywa era ne beeyanza. Nebaafuluma ennyumba.
Nga bakakufuluma,  baafuna ekirowoozo ekibi ne bagamba,  "Tekisoboka ensekere okutuwa emmere." Era amangu ago bakkiriziganya okuddayo batte ensekere.
Baddayo mu nnyumba ne batta ensekere. Amangu ddala ensekere yafa,  n'ennymba n'esaanawo! Beesanga bali mu kyangaala.

isiXhosa:
Yimini yam yokuqala esikolweni. Ndihamba nomama endithe chu ngesandla. “Ndimdala ngoku,” nditshilo
kuye. “Ndiyeke, ndiyeke!” Umama usibambe wasiqinisa nkqi 
isandla sam.
Kunabantwana abaninzi ngasesikolweni. Baze ngebhasi, ngemoto, ngesithuthu. Abanye banyova ibhayisikile. Abanye bahamba ngeenyawo, njengam.

Sifika esangweni. Umama uyayeka ukundibamba. Umi esangweni. Ndingene
ngaphakathi ndedwa, ndijikelezwe bubuso babantu abaninzi abatsha.

Ndithabathe inyathelo lokuqala. Ndithathe nelisibini. Ndibheka
ngasemva. Umama uya ebamncinci njengokuba mna ndibheka phaya. Ingaba
uzakunyamalala? Ndibaleke ndaphindela kuye. Andiziva ndikhulile mna ngoku.
Ndimbambe ngesandla. “Sukuhamba,” nditshilo.

Wonke umntu ungaphakathi ngoku. Ndim ndedwa oshiyeke
ngaphandle. Utitshala uyaphuma. Uyandincumela. Nam ndimncumele. Umama uthi,
“Rani, ndiza kube ndilapha xa uphuma.” Ndiyasiyeka isandla sakhe.
Uyandibhabhayisa.
Ndibalekela ngaphakathi. Umama uzakube ekhona ukuphuma kwesikolo!
Luganda:
Lwe lunaku lwange olusoka ku somero
Maama ankute kumukono era atambula nange
"kati nkuze,"bwengamba."Tuugende,tugende.!"
Maama ankwata ku mukono nanyweza.

Waliwo abaana baanji ku somero.
Bajira mu bassi. Bajira mu motoka entono.
Bajira mu tukutuku(egaali eyemipira esatu)
Bajira ku pikipikii.
abalala bajira kubigere  ngabatambula nga nze.

Tutuka ku nziji eziyingira ku somero.Maama anta omukono gwange.
Asigala ku mulyango. Nze nina munda mu somero nzeka.
Waliwo  abantu abapya banji abanetolode.

Nteka ekigere ekisoka mumaso.nteka ekigere ekirala mumaso.Ntunura emabega.Bweneyongera okutambula ndaba maama nga mutono.AAnabulirayo?
NNziruka nzira jali.sikyawulira nga akuze. Nkwata omukono gwe.
"Togenda !"bwengamba.

Buli omu ali munda kati.Nze nzeka ali wabweru. Omusomesa afuluma wabweru.  Ammwenyeza. Nange mumwenyeza.
Maama angamba,"njakubera wano  bwona fuluma."
Awo nta  omukono gwe. Ansiibula.
Nziruka munda. Maamaa aja kuberawo nga okusoma kuwedde!

isiXhosa: Kwakukho ihlathi elimnyama.
Yayilihlathi elikhulu elimnyama. Kwakukho imithi emininzi nendlela emxinwa. Izilwanyana ezininzi neentaka zazihlala apha.

Ngenye imin,  zonke izilwanyana zadibana. "Uvile?"wabuza uTota,  isikhwenene. "Ewe" watsho uHirni,  ixhama. "Intoni?" wabuza uDarpok,  umvundla. "Sinesikolo ehlathini," Waphendula uZhoola,  inkawu. UMota,  indlovu yamangaliseka,  "Hmph?" uLamboo,  indlulamthi yathi,  "Oo kulungile!" uDheema,  inkumba yatswina,  "Khawuleza,  masihambe."

UTota,  isikhwenene sabhabha phambili. UZhoola,  inkawu yatsiba emthini ukuya komnye umthi. UPoorakha,  irhamba larhubuluza ngokukhawuleza. "Apha!" wakhwaza uTota. "Ungafunda?" "Igqwethekile,  ndiyacinga," watsho uZhoola ejinga esebeni. UPoorakha waqgibezela,  "Si-i-i-i-i. Akukho mntu unokufunda."

Kwakamsinya,  bonke abanye abahlobo baqhagamshelane nabo. ULamboo wajonga ngapha komthi. "Akukho mntu apha," watsho. UZhoola waphinda,  "Akukho mntu apha." UTota wacebisa, "Jonga ngocoselelo!" UPilloo,  ibhere elincinane wapapasha,  "Ndifumene igumbi!"
"Ndifumene ujingi," wachaza uDheema. Zintoni ezi ziqobo?" UDarpok wafuna ukwazi. "Yintoni le?" Yayingumbuzo kaZhoola. UPoorakha wacacisa,  "Ndiyakholwa ukuba yipensile le.
UMota noLamboo bafumana igumbi lokufundela. Babiza abanye,  "Jonga,  yintoni le!" Wonke ubani weza nobhaka. Baqalisa ukukhwaza, "Titshala! Titshala! Uphi utitshala wethu?" Akwabikho waziyo.
Baza beva umgqumo. Beva umgqumo omkhulu. Beva umgqumokazi. UPoorakha wakhathazeka. UDeema woyika. UTota wazimela emva kwebhodi. ULamboo noZhoola babedidekile.
Ngubani lo? "Hupu! Watsho uZhoola inkawu. Akwatheha nomnye. Bonke bajonga kutitshala. Phezulu naphantsi ngocoselelo. Baza bajongana omnye nomnye."

Utitshala wajika ukuba abhale ebhodini. "Xhuma," watsho uZhoola. "Bhabha!" watsho uTota. Ngqe-e,  ngqe-e,  ngqe-e,  wabaleka uMota. "Baleka,  baleka,  baleka,  ngokukhawuleza," wakhwaza uDheema. "Bhagoooo," bakhwaza bonke ngexesha elinye. Wathi akujika utitshala Kwakungekho nomnye eklasini.
Luganda: Awo olwatuka! Walingawo ekibira ekya limu ekizikiza ekyinji.
Kyali kibira kinene nga kilimu ekizikiza. Mwalinga mu emmiti minji na kakubo akatono. Ebisolo ne binyonyi bingi bya belanga omwo.

Olunaku lwakya ensolo zona zakungana. "Mwawulide?" Tota, Kasuku yabuza. "iye," Hirni, Engabi yadamu. "Ekki?" Darpok, Akamyu nekabuza. "Tulina esomero mukibira," Zhoola Enkima nemudamu. Mota Enjovu neyewunya, "hmph?" Lamboo, Entulege negamba, "Oh, kilungi!" Dheema, Ekovu ne li gamba, "twanguye, tugende!"

Tota, kasuku nabuka emaso. Zhoola, enkyima nebuka okuva kumuti okuda kumula bwetyo. Poorakha, timba ne yekulula mangu. "Wano!" Tota nalekana. "Ani asobola okusoma?" Kyesulise, ndowoza, "Zhoola nagamba nga weyewubira kutabi lyomuti. Poorakha nagamba, "Hisssss. Tewali asobola kusoma."

Oluvanyuma mikwno jjabwe nejebegatako. Lamboo natunula wagulu wo mutti. "Twewali aliwo wano," nagamba. Zhoola nadamu, "Tewali aliwo wano." Tota nateesa, "Tu nonye bulungi!" Pilloo, bear ento negamba, "Nsanze ekisenge!"
"Nasanga ekysubo", Dheema nalangira. "Bloka ki zino?" Darpok yayagala amanye. "Kiki kino?" Zhoola kye yabuza. Poorakha yanyonyola, "Nkiwa, eno kalamu."
Moto ne Lamboo ne basanga kilasi. Nebayita abalala, "Mulabe, kiki kino?" Bulyomu yajja nensawo. Nebatandika okulekana, "Musomesa! Musemesa! Omusomesa waffe aliwa? Tewali ayali amanyi.
Awo ne bawulila edobozi edene. Bawulila edobozi edene. Ne bawulila edobozi edene. Poorakha ne yelalikirira. Dheema ya tya. Tota yekweka emabega wa boardi. Lamboo ne Zhoola bali babuzabuzidwa.
Ani ono? "HUP!" Zhoola enkyima negamba. Tewali yayogera. Bona ne batunulila omusomesa. Nga we bamutunulila wagulu ne wansi bulungi. Awo ne betunulila.

Omusomesa bwe ya kuka okuwandika ku black boardi. "Mukongoje," Zhoola nagamba. "Mubuke! Tota naye nagamba. Thump, thump, thump duka Mota. "Muduke, muduke, muduke, muduke emisinde," Dheema na lagana. "Bhagoooo," bona baleka. Omusomesa weya kyuka. Tewali yali mu kilaasi.

isiXhosa: Kwakukho ibhasi enye qha kwilali kaEbei. Yayinkulu kwaye imzuba. Yayingxola kakhulu.
“Sizakuya edolophini ngomso,” watsho umama kaEbei. “Sizakuthenga iyunifom yakhoyesikolo.”
Wavuya kakhulu u-Ebei. Babezohamba ngebhasi enkulu emzuba. Akazange akwazi ukulalangobobusuku.
Wathi xa umama wakhe ezekumvusa, wabe sele enxibile u-Ebei.
U-Ebei nomama wakhe baya esikhululweni sebhasi. Balinda ibhasi enkulu emzuba. Kodwaayizange ifike ibhasi.
Abanye abantu bafika esikhululwenisebhasi. Bakhalaza ngoba ibhasi ayizange ifikengexesha. “Iphi ibhasi?” babuza.
Wayekhathazekile u-Ebei. “Asizukwazi ukuya edolophini,” wacinga. “Andizukwaziukufumana iyunifom yam.”
Abanye abantu banikezela baze bagoduka. Walila u-Ebei. Wayengafuni ukugoduka.“Sizakulinda okwexeshana,” watsho umama wakhe.
Ngesaquphe, beva ingxolo. Babona uthuli emoyeni. Yayisiza ibhasi!
Kodwa le bhasi yayingekho mzuba. Yayingekho nkulu. Yayibomvu kwaye incinci. Abantubabengafuni ukuyikhwela lebhasi.
“Khwelani! Khwelani!” wakhwaza umqhubi. “Sishiyiwe lixesha namhlanje,” wakhwaza.
U-Ebei nomama wakhe bakhwela kuqala. Kungekudala nabanye bakhwela ibhasi encinci ebomvu.
U-Ebei wajonga efestileni. Wabona kusekho abanye abantu esikhululweni sebhasi.
Igquba labantu laleqa ibhasi. Kodwa babeshiywe lixesha. Ibhasi ebomvu yayigcwele.Yahamba isiya edolophini.
“Iphi ibhasi enkulu emzuba?” wabuza umama kaEbei. “Imoshakele,” waphendula umqhubi.“Siyayilungisa. Iza kuza ngomso.”
U-Ebei wayenganankathalo ngombala webhasi. Wayengakhathalelanga bungakanani bayo.Le bhasi yayisiya edolophini!
Luganda: Ku kyaalo ky'Ebei kwaliko baasi emu yokka. Baasi eyo yali nnene nga ate ya bululu. Era yaliereekaana nyo!
Lumu maama w'Ebei yagamba, “Enkya tujja kugenda mu kibuga nkugulire olugoyelw'essomero.”
Ebei yasanyuka nnyo bweyalowooza ku kutambulirako mu gu baasi ogunene ogwa bululu. Era ekiro ekyo teyakomba ku mpeke ya tulo.
Maama w'Ebei yagenda okujja okumuzuukusa, yamusanga yazuukuse dda nga n'okwambalayamaze dda!
Ebei ne maama we baatambula nebagenda mu kifo we balinyira baasi nebagirinda. Nayeekyakabi baasi teyalabikako.
Abantu abalala nabo baatuuka awalinyirwa baasi nebatandika okwemulugunya nti, “Iii, baasi nga eruddeyo? Oba yatulese dda?”
Ebei yerarikirira era wakati mu birowoozo nagamba nti, “Kirabika tetukyagenze mu kibuga era n'olugoye lwange olw'essomero sikyalufunye.”
Abantu abamu baakoowa nebeddirayo eka. Naye Ebei ye nakaaba nga tayagala kuddayowaka. Maamawe namugumya.
Amangu ago baawulira okuvuuma, nebalaba n'enfuufu mu bbanga.
Baasi eyajja yali myufu ate nga ntono. Abaali bagirinze baagitunuulira era tebaagirinya.
“Muyingire! Muyingire!” omugoba wa baasi nabakowoola. “Leero tuli kikeerezi nnyo!”
Ebei ne maama we bebaasookera ddala okuyingira. Olwo buli muntu nayingira.
Ebei yatunula mu ddirisa naalaba abantu nga beyongedde obungi.
Nabalala nga baja badduka nabo bajirinye naye baatuuka kikeerezi nga baasi ejjudde. Baasi emyufu neyolekera ekibuga.
Maama wa Ebei yabuuza nti, “Baasi eyabulu ennene eri wa?” Omugoba wa baasi yaddamu nti,“Yafunye obuzibu. Tukyagidabiiriza naye ejja kujja enkya.”
Ebei teyafaayo ku langi oba obunene bwa baasi. Ekyamusanyusa kyali nti baasi egenda mu kibuga.

isiXhosa: Ngeminazana ithile, Ukhozi nesikhukhukazi babengabahlobo abakhulu. Babencedana kumaxesha kaxakeka.
Babedlala bobabini. Bedlala nezinye izilwanyane ezifana nofudo.
Babenomkhambi wee nkomo, iigusha,  iibhokhwe nee nkamela. Babe sidla ndawonye emathafeni bedlala.
Ngaminazana ithile isikhukhukazi sayoboleka ireyiza bleyidi kuKhozi khona ukuze sichebe abantwana baso. Ukhozi lwanikeza nge reyiza bleyidi ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo.
Isikhukhukazi sacheba abantwana baso ngocoselelo. Kodwa salibala uku gcina ireyiza khuselekileyo.
Xa uKhozi lufika luzolanda ireyiza, Isikhukhukazi asayifumana. Sakhangele yonke indawo kodwa sabuya nelize. Ukhozi lwacaphuka laqala ukutya iinkukhu zesikhukhukazi.
Isikhukhukazi sabaleka sisindisa ubomi baso sayo hlala nabantu. Ukufihlela namhlanje isikhukhukazi sihlala nabantu lona ukhozi lutya iinkukhu.

isiXhosa: NgeCawa, abazali baka Manu bamphathele ibhatyi ebomvu yemvula."Mama, ndingayinxiba ngoku?"uyabuza uManu."Hayi, sana, iimvula zisondele, kodwa okwangoku isibhaka-bhaka singcwengile,"Utsho umama.
Ngomvulo kwakukhanya kukho nelanga."ingaba izakunetha namhlanje, mama"?uyabuza uManu."Hayi Manu, hayi namhlanje. Ukuba unxiba ibhatyi yakho, uzakujongeka ngendlela engaqhelekanga!"utshilo umama.
Ngolwesibini, isibhaka-bhaka besiluhlaza."Mama, uzakufezeka nini umnqweno wam?" Uyabuza uManu.Hayi namhlanje, sana lwam, kukho nje ilifu elinye phezulu!" uphendulile umama.
Ngolwesithathu kwabashushu."Mama, Kutheni inganethi nje?"uyabuza uManu."Ndoda, ndicinga kuzakunetha kungekudala. Mhlawumbi phambi kokuba kutshone ilanga."Uphendule watsho umama.

Ngolwesine uManu uhambile waya kwi pikniki."Mama xa inokunetha? Ndingayithatha ibhatyi yam yemvula ndihambe nayo?"ubuzile uManu."Hayi sana lwam, Soze inethe namhlanje. La mafu mancinane aphezulu kakhulu esibhaka-bhakeni. utshilo umama.
Ngolwesihlanu kwakusibekele"Mama,Izakunetha namhlanje?" uyabuza uManu."Kungenzeka,sana lwam. Kukho amafu amnyama phantsi kwesibhaka-bhaka."Utshilo umama.
Umgqibelo uqale ngesithonga!Bhadabhuum!"Mama, ngumdudumo lo ndiwuvayo? ingaba kungakunetha kungekudala?"ubuzile uManu.
Ekugqibeleni, iqale yanetha!"Oh, kuyanetha,kuyanetha,"wacula uManu, wabaleka waphuma phandle.
"Kodwa Manu"wamkhwaza umama, ebaleka emva kwakhe,"ulibele ibhatyi yakho yemvula!"
Luganda: Ku sande, bazadde ba Manu bmufunira ekooti y'enkuba emyufu.

Kulw'okuna Manu yagendako kukabaga."Maama, naye enkuba bwenatonya? Ntwale ekooti yange ey'enkuba.
Kulw'okutaano obudde bwali bwakiddedde."Maama, Enkuba enatonya leereo?" Manu abuza
Olw'omukaaga lwatandiika n'okubwatuuka!Badaboom!
Kunkomerero, enkuba yatandiika okutonya!!oh, enkuba etonya, enkuba etonya,"Manu yayimba.

isiXhosa: UShanti noArun babengabahlobo abalungileyo.Babonwabile kunye.Babelana ngeemfihlo eklasini.Babaleka imidyarho endleleni egodukayo.Wayesoloko evuya.

Ngenye imini, uShanti wangena kwigumbi lokufundela ethe chu. Intloko yakhe yayigobile. Wayekhangeleka elusizi. “Kukho umntu okuthethisileyo?” wabuza uArun.UShanti wanikina intloko. Uye wahlala phantsi khange ajonge phezulu. Khange aphendule 'ukhona !' Xa uSona Miss embiza ngegama. USona Miss uphinde wakhwaza kwakhona, “Shanti Kumar!” UShanti waphakamisa isandla.
“Unomqala obuhlungu?”utitshala wakhe wambuza.UShanti wanikina intloko.Izidlele zakhe zazibomvu kubonakala ukuba unomkhuhlane.“Uziva kakuhle?”UShanti wanqwala, ebengenabuganga bokujonga.

“Kutheni uShanti ekhangeleka elusizi kangaka?”“Uyaphila umntakwenu omncinci?”“Ngaba injana yakho iphilile?”"Uyaphila umakhulu wakho?"UShanti wayemana ukunqwala intloko kubahlobo bakhe bonke. Kodwa khange ajonge phezulu.
UArun wayefuna ukumenza ancume. Wayenombono!Wakhupha into ebhegini.Xa wayebaleka eyokuyibonisa uShanti, yaphuma ezandleni zakhe.UShanti wabona into ibhabhela kuye wayibamba.

Yayiyirhaba enkulu, eluhlaza yesele! Amehlo kaShanti avele avuleka.Emva koko wavula umlomo wahleka.WAYA ke uArun nabahlobo bakhe babona isizathu sokuba angancumi okanye athethe imini yonke!Amane amazinyo akhe angaphambili awekho!
Luganda:
Shanti ne Arun baali bamikwano nnyo. Baalinanga ebinyumo bombi.

Bagabananga ebyama mukibiina. Badukanga emisinde nga badayo ewaka.

Yabelanga musamufu nnyo.

Lwari lumu, Shanti nnaja mukibiina nga'sooba. Omutwe nga agukotese. Yali munyizu. " Eliyo akuvumye?" Arun yabuza.

Shanti yanyenya omutwe gwe. Yattula wansi natatunula wagulu. Teyadamu nti 'wendi!' mukyala Sona bwetayita erinyalye. Mukyala Sona yadamu okuyita, nnyo mukasela kano,
"Shanti Kumar!" Shanti nawanika omutwe gwe.

"Olina omumilo oguluma?"omusomesa weyamubuza
Shanti yanyenya omutwe gwe.

Amatamage gaali gamyuse nga'tunulanga alimu omusujja.

"Olibulingi?" Mukyala Sona yabuza.

"Lwaki Shanti atunula munyizu nnyo?"

"Mutowo omulenzi alibulingi?"

"Akabwa ko kalibulungi?"

"Jjaaja mukyala alibulingi?"

Shanti yasigala anyenya omutwe gwe kubuli mukwano gwe. Naye teyatunulako wagulu.

Arun yayagala amulete akamwenyo. Yafuna ekilowozo! Alina kyeyaja mu'nsayoye.

Yali adduka okukyilaga Shanti, kya sselera okuva mungaloze. Shanti yalaba ekyali kibuuka okujajeyali na'kikwata.

Kyali ekikeere EKINEENE, ekyakilagala, ekyalabba!

Shanti yagula amaaso. Na'gula no'mumwagwe okuseka.

AWO Arun ne mikwano gye nebalaba lwaki yali tamwenya oba tayogera olunaku lwana!

Aana kumanyo ge agomumaso gali gabulamu!

isiXhosa: Dibana noNeema.Njengawe, uyakuthanda ukutya.Kungenxa yoko le nto,UNeema uhlala esitya kwaye esitya.
HLAFUNA! HLAFUNA!MMM.....MMMOho! Vala umlomo xa uhlafuna, Neema!

X kusibekele lixesha lokutya umbona - tyheli, mhlophe, mfusa.Amanqatha amnandi aswiti kunye namanzi,Iipayina zinezithsaba ezintlokweni zazoImfusa kunye na-thambileyo ,Oho! Ulwimi lukaNeema aluthambile kwaye luhlaza okwesibhakabhaka!

isiXhosa:
Yimini yam yokuqala esikolweni. Ndihamba nomama endithe chu ngesandla. “Ndimdala ngoku,” nditshilo
kuye. “Ndiyeke, ndiyeke!” Umama usibambe wasiqinisa nkqi 
isandla sam.
Kunabantwana abaninzi ngasesikolweni. Baze ngebhasi, ngemoto, ngesithuthu. Abanye banyova ibhayisikile. Abanye bahamba ngeenyawo, njengam.

Sifika esangweni. Umama uyayeka ukundibamba. Umi esangweni. Ndingene
ngaphakathi ndedwa, ndijikelezwe bubuso babantu abaninzi abatsha.

Ndithabathe inyathelo lokuqala. Ndithathe nelisibini. Ndibheka
ngasemva. Umama uya ebamncinci njengokuba mna ndibheka phaya. Ingaba
uzakunyamalala? Ndibaleke ndaphindela kuye. Andiziva ndikhulile mna ngoku.
Ndimbambe ngesandla. “Sukuhamba,” nditshilo.

Wonke umntu ungaphakathi ngoku. Ndim ndedwa oshiyeke
ngaphandle. Utitshala uyaphuma. Uyandincumela. Nam ndimncumele. Umama uthi,
“Rani, ndiza kube ndilapha xa uphuma.” Ndiyasiyeka isandla sakhe.
Uyandibhabhayisa.
Ndibalekela ngaphakathi. Umama uzakube ekhona ukuphuma kwesikolo!
